snippet: Mr. Arsham is not only a legitimate artist, but he has also collaborated with high-profile admirers, like James Franco, Hedi Slimane and Pharrell Williams.
abstract: Artist Daniel Arsham is rising star, with spring exhibitions at the Cincinnati Contemporary Arts Center and Galerie Perrotin in New York, and number of celebrity collaborations to his name; Asham is known for casting replicas of everyday objects in unusual materials and playing with architectural distortion.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Arsham is not only a legitimate artist, but he has also collaborated with high-profile admirers, like James Franco, Hedi Slimane and Pharrell Williams.

headline.main: Why Celebrities Are So Into the Artist Daniel Arsham
headline.print_headline: Seeing the Future in Black and White
